column1: Mora is a town in northern Cameroon. Mora has a population of 55
column2: 216 making it the 5th biggest city in Far North.The German fort of Mora was the last German fort in Cameroon to surrender during World War I. After a long time under siege by allied forces
column3: Captain von Raben and his men surrendered to the allied forces on February 20
column5: over a year after the rest of the German army withdrew out of Cameroon. Many German troops escaped to the neutral Spanish colony of Río Muni.
